items.sentence: I know that eventually I'm going to have to tell Tom about what happened.
Man, I just saw it on the news! Damn, you're making me doubt my own eyes!
Comedy always includes a little tragedy. That's why there are sad clowns.
I wouldn't have bought this if I'd known it had been made by slave labor.
If you don't do what the boss told you to do, you're likely to get fired.
If Tom had been wearing a helmet, he wouldn't have been so badly injured.
Just because you like something doesn't mean everyone else likes it, too.
I don't want to spend more than thirty dollars on Tom's birthday present.
I understand everything now and I regret that Tom isn't here with me now.
Tom was afraid Mary might poke her eye out, so he told her to be careful.
